Our Tours

Telemarkskanalen Skien-Skotfoss

Telemarkskanalen stretches from coast to mountains with great variations in landscape and character. From idyllic southern coastlines, via fruitfarmers in Middle-Telemark to the high mountains and the mighty Hardangervidda.
Read More...

Bergen - Ole Bull Museum

This is a tour for more experienced cyclers. Starting from the tourist information in bergen we move south about 30km to Lysekloster, where we take the boat over to Lysøen.
There we will visit Ole Bull's mansion that was built 1872-73. It is a construction that is beutiful and you have probably not seen anything like it.
Read More...

Trondheims finest

A little trip around Trondheim to see some of it's finest attractions.
Starting at Visit Trondheim we will cycle the 700m to Nidaros Domkirke. Then we will ride 900m to Kristiansten Festsning via Gamle Bybro.
After that we will take the last 4,1km to NTNU Ringve botaniske hage.
Read More...

View over Tromsø

This little trip is suited for anyone. We start out at Visit Tromsø and pedals trough the town, over the iconic bridge and stops at Ishavskatedralen.After spending some time there we ride a bit further to Fjellheisen to take the lift up to the viewpoint on top of the mountain.
Read More...
